languages.text: "Твари в этом месте понимают лишь язык боли, шерин. Давайте размозжим ей башку, пока не случилось чего-нибудь непоправимого".
"The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."
languages.original_text: "Твари в этом месте понимают лишь язык боли, шерин. Давайте размозжим ей башку, пока не случилось чего-нибудь непоправимого".

traits.locale_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「この辺りの生き物は痛がる声しか通じないよ、シャリーン。取り返しがつかなくなる前に、そいつの頭を壊しちまおう」
languages.original_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."

traits.locale_text: 「この辺りの生き物は痛がる声しか通じないよ、シャリーン。取り返しがつかなくなる前に、そいつの頭を壊しちまおう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这里的生物只懂得痛苦的语言，亲爱的。不如先敲碎它的脑袋，以免发生不可挽回的事情。”
languages.original_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."

traits.locale_text: “这里的生物只懂得痛苦的语言，亲爱的。不如先敲碎它的脑袋，以免发生不可挽回的事情。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Les créatures qui vivent ici ne comprennent que le langage de la douleur, shereen. Fracassons-leur le crâne avant qu'il ne se produise quelque chose d'irréparable. »
languages.original_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."

traits.locale_text: « Les créatures qui vivent ici ne comprennent que le langage de la douleur, shereen. Fracassons-leur le crâne avant qu'il ne se produise quelque chose d'irréparable. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Las criaturas de este sitio solo comprenden el idioma del dolor, shereen. Vamos a reventarle la cabeza antes de que ocurra algo que no podamos remediar».
languages.original_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."

traits.locale_text: «Las criaturas de este sitio solo comprenden el idioma del dolor, shereen. Vamos a reventarle la cabeza antes de que ocurra algo que no podamos remediar».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Die Kreaturen an diesem Ort verstehen nur die Sprache des Schmerzes, Shereen. Schlagen wir ihr den Schädel ein, ehe etwas passiert, das wir nicht ungeschehen machen können."
languages.original_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kreaturen an diesem Ort verstehen nur die Sprache des Schmerzes, Shereen. Schlagen wir ihr den Schädel ein, ehe etwas passiert, das wir nicht ungeschehen machen können."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu mekândaki yaratıkların anladığı tek dil, acının dilidir şirinim. Pişman olacağımız bir şey yaşanmadan önce kafasını ezelim gitsin."
languages.original_text: "The creatures in this place only understand the language of pain, shereen. Let's smash its head in before something happens that we can't undo."

traits.locale_text: "Bu mekândaki yaratıkların anladığı tek dil, acının dili şirinim. Geriye alamayacağımız bir şey yaşanmadan önce kafasını ezelim hadi."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
